## Source: amazon-inspector (312b617198eea306feca99cf5c14a0edb7668482ca605c8e74c2d20f71eddd19)
The package signup-failover was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (efb6109065f3f4e71c6d93b290aae6228221cf289acce911a72a127799195053)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'signup-failover' @ 10.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
